com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.loot

Class LootBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.loot.LootBundle

  • public class LootBundle
extends java.lang.Object
    A LootBundle is a collection of items, commands, money, and experience that has been rolled for
    Author:
    Codisimus

    • Constructor Summary
